metadata.synopsis: Dialogue when clicking on boat in cave to reach Grymforge. Player can stay or cross. This dialogue only appears once player has already been to Grymforge.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps (will only work with new game):1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use debug book - go to region - act 1 - underdark - lone duergar4. Use the Recon command: "setOnstage S_UND_DuergarCamp_BoatAtCave"6. goto -16.45, 0.50, -235.737. Click on the boat.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Boat sits in the water

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party boards the boat. Player sees the boat sail for a few seconds from the shore with the party on board.InternalNodeContext: Cinematic needs to be few seconds, a single node. Just to establish we're going through a long journey from A to B.
